name: Gluten-Free Gingersnaps
author: Cameron Houser
summary: These are flat and crunchy, crispy gingersnap cookies made with oat flour.
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line cookie sheets with parchment paper
Beat 1 cup sugar and margarine together in a medium bowl until creamy
Beat in egg and molasses until well blended
Combine oat flour, ginger, baking powder, cinnamon, salt, and cardamom in another bowl; stir into the molasses mixture to form a dough
Roll dough into 1-inch balls and rolls in the remaining 1/2 cup sugar
Place cookies 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets
Bake in the preheated oven until tops are slightly cracked, 15 to 18 minutes
Let cookies cool for 5 minutes before removing to a wire rack to cool completely
